trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The item is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Irrepressible Dance
entries: When any creature starts its turn within 10 feet of the item, the item can increase or decrease (your choice) the walking speed of that creature by 10 feet until the end of the turn, provided the item isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Force-Empowered Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~spell-atk~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d10 + ~prof~ force damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the puppet remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a mundane puppet or doll.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While the puppet is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

trait.name: Ventriloquism
entries: While the puppet is on the same plane of existence as its master, the master can telepathically command the puppet to speak, imitating his master's voice.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

action.name: Scare (1/Day)
entries: One creature of the living puppet's choice within 20 feet of it must succeed on a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the living puppet is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: Your Hound has advantage on any ability check that relies on their hearing or smell.

trait.name: Steadfast Companion
entries: Your Hound has advantage on any saving throw it is forced to make so long as it is within 30 feet and can see or hear you.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Whenever you command your Hound to take the Attack action, it can make two Maul attacks, or one Maul attack and one Bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~str-prof~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + ~str-prof~ piercing damage and the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC equals ~prof-dc~) or be grappled. The Hound can only grapple one creature at a time.

action.name: Maul
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~str-prof~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + ~str-prof~ slashing damage.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: Your Hound has advantage on any ability check that relies on their hearing or smell.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~str-prof~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + ~str-prof~ piercing damage and the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC equals ~prof-dc~) or be grappled. The Hound can only grapple one creature at a time.

action.name: Maul
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~str-prof~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + ~str-prof~ slashing damage.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The spy drone doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Sensors
entries: The spy drone has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Relay Senses
entries: As an action, you can see through your drone's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses that the drone has. During this time, you are deaf and blind with regard to your own senses.

trait.name: Enhanced Sensors
entries: The drone can see normally in heavily obscured areas and magical darkness.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the drone is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's incapacitated.

trait.name: Spell Channel
entries: As long as you are with 100 feet of your drone, you can cause your spells to originate from the drone instead of you.

action.name: Force Ballista
entries: Ranged Spell Attack: +~spell-atk~ to hit, range 30 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d4 + ~prof~ force damage.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The dragon doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~spell-atk~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d4 + ~dex-prof~ slashing damage plus 1d4 ~essence~ damage.

trait.name: Skeletal Camouflage
entries: While the dust skeleton remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal humanoid's skeleton.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~spell-atk~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d4 + ~prof~ bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dredged Breath (~prof~/Day)
entries: As an action, the skeleton exhales a 15-foot cone of blinding dust. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC ~spell-dc~ Dexterity saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Dust Devil (~prof~/Day)
entries: As a reaction when targeted with an attack, the skeleton can create a small dust storm around itself that lasts until the start of its next turn. While active, the dust storm imposes disadvantage on attacks made against the skeleton for the duration.

trait.name: Mummy Rot
entries: When the mummy deals necrotic damage to a creature, the target must succeed on a DC ~spell-dc~ Constitution saving throw or have its maximum hit points reduced by an equal amount.

action.name: Decaying Grasp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~spell-atk~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d4 + ~prof~ necrotic damage.

action.name: Rotting Grasp (~prof~/Day)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~spell-atk~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 2d6 necrotic damage. If the target fails their saving throw against the mummy's Mummy Rot trait, it must repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns, having its hit point maximum reduced by 1d4 if it fails its saving throw, and ending the effect if it succeeds. If this effect reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. A remove curse spell can end this effect.

reaction.name: Rejuvenation (~prof~/Day)
entries: As a reaction when it takes damage, the mummy can gain ~spell-atk~ temporary hit points. These temporary hit points are gained before the damage is taken.

trait.name: Soul Phasing
entries: The ghost can pass through enemy spaces as though they were difficult terrain, but cannot end its turn in a space occupied by another creature.

action.name: Ice Shard
entries: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +~spell-atk~ to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d4 + ~prof~ cold damage.

action.name: Freezing Drain (~prof~/Day)
entries: Melee Spell Attack: +~spell-atk~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 2d6 cold damage and the ghost regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

reaction.name: Tendancy (~prof~/Day)
entries: As a reaction when targeted with an attack, the ghost can briefly possess the target's mind. The attacker must succeed on a DC ~spell-dc~ Wisdom saving throw or be unable to attack the ghost until after the end of the ghost's next turn; the attacker must choose a new target or else lose the attack.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Dark Embrace
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~spell-atk~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d4 + ~prof~ necrotic damage.

action.name: Blinding Embrace (~prof~/Day)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~spell-atk~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 2d6 necrotic damage and the target must succed on a DC ~spell-dc~ Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of the target's next turn.

reaction.name: Shadow Stride (~prof~/Day)
entries: As a reaction when the shadow is hit by an attack that deals damage, the shadow can engulf itself in darkness and teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny crawling claw.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~spell-atk~ to hit, reach 0 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 2d4 + ~prof~ slashing damage or 1d4 + ~prof~ slashing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Claw's Grasp (~prof~/Day)
entries: As an action, the swarm forces a creature in its space to make a DC ~spell-dc~ Strength saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target is restrained by the swarm, and the swarm can't move or target another creature until the condition ends. An affected creature can repeat its saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effects on a successful save.

reaction.name: Swarming Interception (~prof~/Day)
entries: As a reaction when a creature in the swarm's space makes an attack, the swarm can interrupt them to impose disadvantage on their attack roll.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The ghoul can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~spell-atk~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d6 + ~prof~ piercing damage and the ghoul gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

action.name: Stench (~prof~/Day)
entries: As an action, the ghoul exudes the stench of death. Creatures within 5 feet of it must make a DC ~spell-dc~ Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

reaction.name: Feeding Frenzy (~prof~/Day)
entries: As a reaction when it is hit by an attack, the ghoul can make a Bite attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it.

trait.name: Enduring Flesh
entries: Whenever the zombie takes at least 5 bludgeoning or slashing damage at one time, roll a d20 to determine what else happens to it:
1 - 8: One leg is severed from the zombie if it has any legs left.
9 - 16: One arm is severed from the zombie if it has any arms left.
17 - 20: The zombie is decapitated.

If the zombie is reduced to 0 hit points, all parts of it die. Until then, a severed part acts on the zombie's initiative and has its own action and movement. A severed part has AC 8. Any damage it takes is subtracted from the zombie's hit points.
A severed leg is unable to attack and has a speed of 5 feet.
A severed arm has a speed of 5 feet and can make one claw attack on its turn, with disadvantage on the attack roll. Each time the zombie loses an arm, it loses a claw attack.

If its head is severed, the zombie loses its bite attack and its body is blinded unless the head can see it. The severed head has a speed of 0 feet. It can make a bite attack, but only against a target in its space.

The zombie's speed is halved if it's missing a leg. If it loses both legs, it falls prone. If it has both arms, it can crawl. With only one arm, it can still crawl, but its speed is halved. With no arms or legs, its speed is 0 feet, and it can't benefit from bonuses to speed.
If the zombie is alive, you can use an action to re-attach any separated parts.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

reaction.name: Disparaging Retaliation (~prof~/Day)
entries: As a reaction when the zombie is hit by an attack, it can make a Claw attack against the attacker if the attacker is within 5 feet of the zombie.

trait.name: Incorproeal Movement
entries: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

reaction.name: Vengeful Strike (~prof~/Day)
entries: As a reaction when you are hit by an attack, if the wraith is within 5 feet of the attacker, the wraith can make a Vengeful Grasp attack against the attacker.

action.name: Drake's Breath (1/Day)
entries: The drake exhales destructive energy in a 30-foot cone.  Each creature in the cone must make a DC ~spell-dc~ Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 damage of the drake's essence type on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Drake's Breath (1/Day)
entries: The drake exhales destructive energy in a 30-foot cone.  Each creature in the cone must make a DC ~spell-dc~ Dexterity saving throw, taking 10d6 damage of the drake's essence type on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Infused Strikes
entries: When another creature within 30 feet of the drake that it can see hits a target with a weapon attack, the drake infuses the strike with its essence, causing the target to take an extra 1d6 damage of the drake's essence type.
